alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 4:40AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Mitchell, eastern Jewell, southeastern Clay, eastern Nuckolls, southwestern Fillmore and western Thayer Counties through 515 AM CDT... At 439 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Edgar to near Mankato to Victor. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beloit, Superior, Hebron, Mankato, Deshler, Edgar, Nelson, Glen Elder, Jewell, Davenport, Bruning, Hardy, Ruskin, Asherville, Formoso, Carleton, Simpson, Byron, Oak and Randall. In addition, a High Wind Warning for non-thunderstorm winds also remains in effect, and damaging southerly wind gusts could also occur mainly ahead of this line of storms. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
